ygData.subject: Re: Security Alert
ygData.msgSnippet: I think your post had some mistakes in it, KSLawdogg. BrightBlade was still in the CR chamber, and was cloaked. She did, however, make one fatal mistake...

I think your post had some mistakes in it, KSLawdogg. BrightBlade was 
still in the CR chamber, and was cloaked. She did, however, make one 
fatal mistake... I'll rewrite your post since I have permission to
use 
your chars.

::Chordate/Rex/Perndabot::

A beep shook Chordate from his sleep, the Maximal jerking his head 
over to the screen he had been sitting in front of. Something was 
wrong, the security systems of the ship had picked up a transmission, 
coming from the brig.

The Maximal officer taps a few keys, bringing up the contents and 
further data on the transmission. It was NOT Maximal, that was for 
sure. He swears, tracking the transmission to the brig CR chamber.
The 
other reports, however, didn't report a bot in it...

Chordate swears, pressing a few more keys, a cybernetic gas is 
released into the chamber, meant to put the occupant into stasis.

"Rex," he says into his comm-link to the Maximal on brig duty, 
"There's a bot sending transmissions from Brig CR 2. There is no 
signature from it so it must be cloaked. Check it out."

"On my way," Rex's voice replies, Chordate seeing from the scanners 
that Rex was moving in the direction of the CR.

Chordate nods, begining to talk to himself. "Now... To just find the 
bot that the transmission was meant for..."

He goes to work, tapping more keys.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot smiles, walking after Feline and Skulletron. From what he 
could hear of their conversations, they were obvioustly Alliance
bots. 
He opens his mouth to speak, being stopped by BrightBlade's 
transmission. Perndabot sighs. He had been looking for the brig, but 
had now gotten lost.

"Hey," he says quietly from behind the two bots, "You Alliance 
members?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Yanshosh has the authorization to use Chordate and Smokescreen 
whenever he 
> wants due to me having no time to participate with them)

he saw

the trouble

or so he

much to

Predacon,

Chordate,

he
